articles.title: Redmi Note 12S and Redmi Note 12 Pro 4G make sneaky official debut in Europe - GSMArena.com
articles.description: These made a surprise appearance at a regional launch event in Greece. Only a few hours ago we announced the completed rollout of the new Redmi Note 12...
articles.content: Only a few hours ago we announced the completed rollout of the new Redmi Note 12 series in Europe, but it turns out there was more to the story. At a regional launch event in Athens, Greece, Xiaomi u… [+1467 chars]
